mainBoard.name: Black Lotus
mainBoard.originalText: Adds 3 mana of any single color of your choice to your mana pool, then is discarded. Tapping this artifact can be played as an interrupt.
mainBoard.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add three mana of any one color.

foreignData.name: Todespresse
foreignData.text: Wähle einen Deiner Gegner. Hat dieser Gegner am Ende seiner Versorgungsphase mehr als vier Karten in der Hand, fügt die Todespresse ihm für jede über vier hinausgehende Karte 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

mainBoard.name: Black Vise
mainBoard.originalText: If opponent has more than four cards in hand during his or her upkeep, Black Vise does 1 damage to opponent for each card in excess of four.

rulings.text: You choose one opposing player as it enters and it only affects that one player. This choice is not changed even if Black Vise changes controllers. It becomes useless but stays on the battlefield if that player leaves the game.
If the chosen player has four or fewer cards in their hand as Black Vise's ability resolves, the ability just won't do anything that turn.

mainBoard.text:
As this artifact enters, choose an opponent.
At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, this artifact deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in their hand minus 4.

mainBoard.flavorText: On guard for larger dangers, we underestimated the power and speed of the Imp's muck-crusted claws.
mainBoard.name: Bog Imp
mainBoard.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

foreignData.name: Dunkler Sog
foreignData.text: Für jedes {B} das Du zusätzlich zu den Beschwörungskosten ausgibst, fügt der Dunkle Sog seinem Ziel -das kann sowohl Spieler als auch Kreatur seineinen Schadenspunkt zu. Sodann bekommst Du für jeden so angerichteten Schadenspunkt 1 Lebenspunkt dazu. Du kannst allerdings nicht mehr Lebenspunkte gewinnen als die Kreatur Widerstandskraft bzw. der Spieler Lebenspunkte besitzt.

mainBoard.name: Drain Life
mainBoard.originalText: Drain Life does 1 damage to a single target for each {B} spent in addition to the casting cost. Caster gains 1 life for each damage inflicted. If you drain life from a creature, you cannot gain more life than the creature's current toughness.

rulings.text: Cost reducers can be used to reduce the X part of the mana cost.
You may gain up to the total toughness of the creature even if it was already damaged.

mainBoard.text:
Spend only black mana on X.
Drain Life deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

foreignData.name: Düsternis
foreignData.text: Das Sprechen weißer Zaubersprüche verteuert sich um 3 Mana. Weiße Verzauberungen mit Aktivierungskosten werden ebenfalls um 3 Mana teurer.

mainBoard.name: Gloom
mainBoard.originalText: White spells cost 3 more mana to cast. White enchantments with activation costs require 3 more mana to use.

rulings.text: The additional mana is paid at the same time the spell/ability is cast/activated.
The extra mana is not considered part of the activation cost. It is a separate cost.
The extra mana is part of the total cost, so cost reducers can be applied to this cost.
Activated abilities contain a colon. They're generally written "[Cost]: [Effect]." Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text.

mainBoard.text:
White spells cost {3} more to cast.
Activated abilities of white enchantments cost {3} more to activate.

mainBoard.flavorText: "There is no calamity greater than lavish desires./ There is no greater guilt than discontentment./ And there is no greater disaster than greed." —*Tao Tê Ching 46*
mainBoard.name: Greed
mainBoard.originalText: {B} Draw an extra card and lose 2 life. Effects that prevent or redirect damage may not be used to counter this loss of life.

foreignData.name: Heulen aus dem Jenseits
foreignData.text: Die Zielkreatur erhält +X/+0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

mainBoard.name: Howl from Beyond
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature gains +X/+0 until end of turn.
mainBoard.text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: "...There was no trace/ Of aught on that illumined face..." —Samuel Coleridge, "Phantom"

foreignData.name: Hypnotisierendes Gespenst
foreignData.text:
Kann fliegen.
Fügt das Gespenst einem Spieler Schaden zu, so muß dieser eine zufällig gewählte Karte aus seiner Hand abwerfen. Hat derjenige Spieler keine Karten auf der Hand, ignoriere diesen Effekt.

mainBoard.name: Hypnotic Specter
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
An opponent damaged by Specter must discard a card at random from his or her hand. Ignore this effect if opponent has no cards left in hand.

rulings.text: The ability triggers even if the Specter’s damage is being redirected to an opponent. It does not trigger if damage that would have been dealt to the opponent is redirected to a nonopponent player or a creature, or if the damage is prevented.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random.

foreignData.name: Fürst der Unterwelt
foreignData.text:
Kann fliegen und verursacht Trampelschaden
Opfere während Deiner Versorgungsphase eine Deiner eigenen Kreaturen. Wenn Du keine Kreatur opfern kannst, fügt Dir der Fürst der Unterwelt 7 Schadenspunkte zu. Du kannst den Fürsten der Unterwelt nicht sich selbst opfern.

mainBoard.name: Lord of the Pit
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying, trample
You must sacrifice one of your own creatures during your upkeep or Lord of the Pit does 7 damage to you. You may still attack with Lord of the Pit even if you failed to sacrifice a creature. Lord of the Pit may not be sacrificed to itself.

rulings.text: If Lord of the Pit has gained lifelink, being dealt 7 damage by it doesn’t cause your life total to change, even though you gain and lose life. If your life total is less than 7, you won’t lose the game.
If you control any other creatures as Lord of the Pit’s triggered ability resolves, you must sacrifice one. You can’t choose to be dealt 7 damage instead.
If you have two Lords of the Pit, you can sacrifice them to each other.

mainBoard.text:
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than this creature. If you can't, this creature deals 7 damage to you.

foreignData.name: Wahnsinn
foreignData.text: Ein Spieler Deiner Wahl muß X zufällig ausgesuchte Karten aus seiner Hand abwerfen. Hat er nicht genug Karten, dann muß er alle seine Karten abwerfen.

mainBoard.name: Mind Twist
mainBoard.originalText: Opponent must discard X cards at random from hand. If opponent doesn't have enough cards in hand, entire hand is discarded.
mainBoard.text: Target player discards X cards at random.

mainBoard.name: Mox Jet
mainBoard.originalText: Add 1 black mana to your mana pool. Tapping this artifact can be played as an interrupt.

foreignData.name: Sengir-Vampir
foreignData.text:
Kann fliegen.
Lege jedes Mal eine +1/+1-Spielmarke auf den Vampir, wenn ein Wesen, dem er in diesem Zug Schaden zugefügt hat, auf dem Friedhof landet.

mainBoard.name: Sengir Vampire
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Vampire gets a +1/+1 counter each time a creature dies during a turn in which Vampire damaged it.

rulings.text: If Sengir Vampire deals nonlethal damage to a creature and then a different effect or damage source causes that creature to be put into a graveyard later in the turn, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger and it will get a +1/+1 counter.

Each time a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, check whether Sengir Vampire had dealt any damage to it at any time during that turn. If so, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger. It doesn't matter who controlled the creature or whose graveyard it was put into.
If Sengir Vampire and a creature it dealt damage to are both put into a graveyard at the same time, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger, but it will do nothing when it resolves.

mainBoard.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

foreignData.name: Sonnenring
foreignData.text: {T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um 2 farblose Mana. Spiele diese Eigenschaft wie einen Unterbrechungszauber.

mainBoard.name: Sol Ring
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add 2 colorless mana to your mana pool. This ability is played as an interrupt.

mainBoard.name: Swamp
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {B} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Swamp
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {B} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Swamp
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Add {B} to your mana pool.

mainBoard.name: Tetravus
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Tetravus gets three +1/+1 counters when cast. During your upkeep, you may move each of these counters on or off Tetravus.  Counters moved off of Tetravus become independent 1/1 flying artifact creatures.  If such a creature dies, the counter is removed from play.  Such creatures may not have enchantments cast on them, and they do not share any enchantments on Tetravus.

rulings.text: Any +1/+1 counter which is on this card can be turned into a Tetravite token. It does not care where the +1/+1 counter came from.
If the Tetravus is destroyed when the Tetravites are off the card, they are not destroyed, they are just orphaned.
Only Tetravites from this specific Tetravus may be used for the ability. Ones from a different Tetravus can't.
This card now has two upkeep-triggered abilities. Its controller chooses the order they are put on the stack, and thus the order in which they resolve each upkeep.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
This creature enters with three +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove any number of +1/+1 counters from this creature. If you do, create that many 1/1 colorless Tetravite artifact creature tokens. They each have flying and "This token can't be enchanted."
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile any number of tokens created with this creature. If you do, put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: "About, about in reel and rout The death-fires danced at night; The water, like a witch's oils, Burnt green, and blue and white." —Samuel Coleridge, "The Rime of the Ancient Mariner"
mainBoard.name: Will-o'-the-Wisp
mainBoard.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{B}: Regenerate this creature. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)
